vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of Divided Monarchy, only mentioned at Jer.37.3;
son of: Shelemiah (H8018M); also called Jucal (NIV: Jehukal) at Jer.38.1;
Another name of ye.hu.khal (יְהוּכַל "Jehucal" H3081)
§ Jucal = "Jehovah is able"
a son of Shelemiah and a servant of king Zedekiah whom he sent to Jeremiah to entreat his prayers and advice
vocabInfos._es_Definition: hijo de Selemías; funcionario; en tiempos de Sedequías
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
猶甲 这个陽性專有名詞 人名在原文的意思是 "耶和華是大有能力的"
示利米雅的兒子, 西底家王的臣僕, 被王派去求耶利米的祝禱與忠言 ( #耶38:1| )
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
犹甲 这个阳性专有名词 人名在原文的意思是 "耶和华是大有能力的"
示利米雅的儿子, 西底家王的臣仆, 被王派去求耶利米的祝祷与忠言 ( #耶38:1| )
